Text:
I really want this.  I watched it on TV at the first run, and I want to download it, but it's only moving at 2.5 kB/s, uTorrent is estimating 4 weeks and 5 days. 
Please, I think we need more seeders.
The website says 79 seeders, but the reality is 0.  uTorrent tells me Seeds 0(154) and Peers 9(672)

Seed-whiners who don't understand the most basic things about the software they're using makes my head hurt.

Good series btw!
A10/V10. Thanks uploader! Anyone know where to get subtitles for just the non-english parts?
Nevermind, they are in there. I just saw a part that didn't have a line translated.
